name: Abstract Notebooks
description:
Product design is about so much more than the visuals you create.


Abstract Notebooks connect every step of the product design process -- from ideation to execution -- so you can collaborate seamlessly.

  • Add any set of layers or frames to Notebooks without leaving Figma.
  • Update multiple designs at once with a single click.
  • Get feedback exactly when you need it, and control the review workflow start to finish.

This plugin requires an Abstract Notebooks account.
